vsParam:
That's the thing. [px]
was complimented by Bergamot Sensei!

Really! Well done, [px]!
Ancient alchemy, sounds very complicated.

But, is it OK for you to tell us these things?
It wouldn't be classified information if we all know...

Uh!? Er, um...
Please keep it a secret, and don't tell anyone I told you that!

Maybe something goes wrong!
Let's check it out!

Uh? What are you doing in front of the alchemical Cauldron,
sensei? Did your synthesis fail?

I don't think so! It's not possible.
And there's no sign of a failed synthesis.
Then what's in the alchemical Cauldron...

W-wait. Don't get close! Or you'll see
the most horrible thing in this worldâ€”

What's this thing...
Looks like it's in a mess, and keeps twisting.

It doesn't look like a monster...
But its shape is a bit disgusting...

Ah, did you see it...
It's... that item for sacrifice.
Uh!? You made it with that recipe!?

Yes. But I didn't expect to make something
like an octopus...

Not so much of an octopus as an awful monster...
Right, [px]?
It does look like a monster

I'll pass out if I run into such a
monster when I'm doing gathering outside.

You are right... If we compare this thing to an octopus,
the octopus would be too pathetic...

No, but...
A pathetic octopus is still an octopus...

I-I'm just making an assumption here...
Let's assume this is an item in the shape of an octopus.

I read in the literature that ancient people in some places offered
octopuses to deities in sacrifice to pray for a fish harvest.

Could it be an item used in one of
those sacrifices?

Uh... This is possible.
The ruin where I found this recipe is close to the sea.

I see. We have finally solved the mystery
of the ancient recipe! But...

I didn't know that Bergamot Sensei is so afraid of octopuses.
You just screamed out in fear...

Boohoo...
Looks like I have to admit it... Please don't tell anyone else.

I bet the headmaster knew what item this recipe
would make a long time ago.

Coastal ruins, and a recipe obscured with special means,
it's not hard to guess...

He has guessed it, yet he asked Bergamot Sensei to
interpret and synthesize it, so, that means...

What you are thinking is right...
This is something he would do.

So, this is a small prank...
Right?

Wow, what a kidult...
So, the so called secret is also...

Uh... In a way, he's doing it for my sake. He did this so that
others wouldn't know that I'm afraid of octopuses.

But the synthesis of this recipe is pretty hard.
Giving it to me may not be a prank completely.

How should I be frightened by such a thing? I can no longer
tolerate such a vulnerability. Hum... I need to work harder.

Anyway... The "Classified Quest" is over now.
You two really helped me a lot.

You are welcome!
We are happy to participate in this!

Especially that we saw a hidden side
of Bergamot Sensei, right?

Y-you must keep the secret to yourselves!
You'd do well to remember that. Do you understand?
